Articles.Content:
Hey there!

I´ve just upload the trailer of a KSP movie that I´m going to release on my Youtube channel (Bluer22).

The Movie It´s called: Lost

Here it´s a summary (without any spoilers):

Kerbin Space Center have lost contact with the mission crew in the planet EVE .
The astronauts David Kerman and Valentina Kerman head towards the last known position where they hope to carry out a rescue mission...

 

Here It´s the trailer: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WqBqH9IxYKU

I hope you´ll enjoy it! 

Edited April 26, 2016 by Bluer22
You obviously have some superior video skills, and software, I'm guessing there is quite a bit of post processing. Many of the scenes you just cannot get in the stock game.
